about_the_game:
THE STORY

In the waning embers of the year 1911, three siblings are summoned to their childhood home for the funeral of their father. Lucius, a charming conman. Regulus, an aspiring surgeon. And Drusilla, a haunted ingenue.

Their childhood home is a sprawling estate, deep in the English countryside where time seems to stand still. But when a murder is uncovered, each of the three is put to the test. They have only days to identify the killer – or else become the next victim.

FEATURES

  • A gothic horror murder mystery story

  • Three playable protagonists, each with their own perspective

  • A branching narrative with multiple endings

  • Isometric pixel art graphics illuminated by modern dynamic lighting and shadows

  • An all-original soundtrack

  • Dysfunctional relationships, haunting secrets, and maudlin emotional turmoil!

name: Unspoken Echoes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A gothic horror role-playing game with three playable protagonists thrust into a murder mystery. Explore an old manor. Interrogate suspects. Try not to go insane.
